title: Digital Farm Network
summary: Connecting smallholder farmers through digital platforms
description: This project establishes a network of digital tools and platforms that enable smallholder farmers to access market information, weather data, and best practices. We work with local partners to deploy mobile-first solutions tailored to regional needs.

title: Food Security Dashboard
summary: Real-time monitoring of food security indicators
description: An open-source dashboard that aggregates data from multiple sources to provide real-time insights into food security metrics across different regions. The dashboard helps policymakers and organizations make data-driven decisions.

title: Community Seed Banks
summary: Preserving agricultural biodiversity through local seed banks
description: We partner with communities to establish and maintain seed banks that preserve local crop varieties. This initiative supports food sovereignty and helps communities adapt to changing climate conditions.
